name: tokie
title: Tokie
description: Unified OTP retrieval from iMessage, Gmail, and iCloud Mail. Quickly copy verification codes without context switching.
author: raycast

commands.name: view-2fa-codes
commands.title: View 2FA Codes
commands.description: View and copy recent one-time passcodes from your messages and emails

preferences.name: enableIMessage
preferences.title: Sources
preferences.description: Fetch OTPs from iMessage and SMS messages
preferences.label: iMessage/SMS

preferences.name: enableGmail
preferences.title: Sources
preferences.description: Fetch OTPs from Gmail (requires OAuth Client ID)
preferences.label: Gmail

preferences.name: enableICloudMail
preferences.title: Sources
preferences.description: Fetch OTPs from iCloud Mail via IMAP
preferences.label: iCloud Mail

preferences.name: markAsRead
preferences.title: Configuration
preferences.description: Mark emails as read after copying OTP (Gmail and iCloud)
preferences.label: Mark as Read

preferences.name: autoDelete
preferences.title: Configuration
preferences.description: Delete email after copying OTP (Gmail and iCloud)
preferences.label: Delete After Copy

preferences.name: lookbackMinutes
preferences.title: Configuration
preferences.description: How far back to search for OTPs (in minutes)

preferences.name: gmailClientId
preferences.title: Gmail
preferences.description: OAuth Client ID for Gmail API access

preferences.name: gmailClientSecret
preferences.title: Gmail
preferences.description: OAuth Client Secret (only for Web application type)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
